code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     restConfiguration().contextPath("myapi").port(1234).component("jetty").apiComponent("swagger").apiHost("localhost").apiContextPath("myapi/swagger").skipBindingOnErrorCode(true).scheme("https").hostNameResolver(RestHostNameResolver.allLocalIp).bindingMode(RestBindingMode.json).componentProperty("foo", "123").endpointProperty("pretty", "false").consumerProperty("bar", "456").corsHeaderProperty("key1", "value1").corsHeaderProperty("key2", "value2").     rest("/foo").consumes("xml").produces("json").description("my foo service").get("{id}").apiDocs(false).description("get by id").to("log:id").post().bindingMode(RestBindingMode.xml).description("post something").toD("log:post"). }
